title: Trying to find Runes and Masteries being used by the Zilean in the current game.
body:
Just wondering if we have access to the runes/masteries being used by the players.

I can't find any kind of extra information on the oce.lolesports page. (it's such a terrible website)

Anyone know where I can find them?

replies.body:
Hey @Reynbow - as LolTies has posted - check out 

http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/ESPORTSTMNT03/30689?gameHash=562455a89e38fc8a&tab=builds&participant=8

If its not working, just hit on player builds again.

Overall it's definitely something that we want to be available on LoLEsports - but as you could guess, the shift from online to LAN games this year has changed how all the data is stored and displayed, which has brought a host of challenges with it!

> [{quoted}](name=belquin,realm=OCE,application-id=ATM3HYki,discussion-id=eOTOIPaf,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2017-01-22T23:21:40.859+0000)

> If its not working, just hit on player builds again.

Still not working for me :(

What about this one here: riot.com/2iPXr5N

If it doesn't work, I can send you a screen grab of Zilean specifically (if you are interested in the same one as OP)


> [{quoted}](name=Main Line,realm=OCE,application-id=ATM3HYki,discussion-id=eOTOIPaf,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2017-01-23T01:18:18.293+0000)
>
> Still not working for me :(

The other tabs work, but not the player builds tab. Yeah maybe post a screen grab of their stuff for the OP.

Edit: that one works now on a refresh, thanks!

> [{quoted}](name=Main Line,realm=OCE,application-id=ATM3HYki,discussion-id=eOTOIPaf,comment-id=0002000000000000,timestamp=2017-01-23T01:33:12.918+0000)
>
> The other tabs work, but not the player builds tab. Yeah maybe post a screen grab of their stuff for the OP.
> 
> Edit: that one works now on a refresh, thanks!

Sweet! great success haha (not!). If you follow the OPL twitter https://twitter.com/opl these are posted after the game.

Cheers!

http://matchhistory.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/ESPORTSTMNT03/30689?gameHash=562455a89e38fc8a&tab=overview

twitter.com/opl is posting these very shortly after the matches. However the match history page itself isn't working for me and there's info on oce.lolesports.com that suggests that maybe this isn't working at the minute. I'll see what I can do for you, no promises though :)

Post from 2 years ago from a coach of an OPL team:

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/esports/6YEABYdE-can-we-get-full-match-history-links-for-all-of-our-opl-games

still waiting.

Basically have to wait until some very dedicated people update the wiki with the information: http://lol.esportspedia.com/wiki/OPL/2017_Season/Split_1
